product_name: Salomon Pearl Boa Snowboard Boots - Women's - 2013/2014
long_description: Get to the lift quick! The Salomon Pearl Boa snowboard boots go on easily and feature a fast, secure and easy-to-use Boa(R) lacing sytem so you can dial in your fit quick and get to the slopes. Boa(R) Coiler lacing system, with ankle and cable guides along entire edge of eyestays, distributes closure force evenly for a dialed-in fit that won't loosen up. The Coiler scoops up loose cable when entering as well as exiting the boot; put your foot in, pull back on the tongue, twist the reel a few times and you're off. Thermal-formable Feelgood liners conform to your feet after several days of riding, and are crafted with a wide range of foams to fit specific flex zones on feet and ankles. Preshaped footbeds provide stabilize your feet in the boots, offer arch support and distribute pressure evenly across your soles; antimicrobial finish helps keep odors at bay. Liner lacing system is a quick, 1-pull tightener that won't hurt your fingers; it provides a supportive, personalized fit with natural flex and feel. Salomon Pearl Boa boots with stomp outsoles protect you on hard landings and offer amazing traction; plus, they allow you to feel the board and respond to it.
